    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Anthropology Subject Guide &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Oct 3, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/anthropology
     </span>

        <span id="guide_tab_title_bar_page_name">
         Finding Background Information
        </span>
        <span id="guide_tab_title_bar_page_print" class="font11">

        </span>
       </td>
       <td align="right" style="white-space:nowrap;">
        <span class="lgsearch">

        <form method="post" name="homesearch" style="display:inline;">

         </label>

            <div id="lgsearch_label" class="lgsearch_item">
             &nbsp;&nbsp;Search:&nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_field" class="lgsearch_item">
             <input type="text" class="searchField" name="searchs" id="searchs" onkeypress="return handleEnterSearch(event,'homesearch','customSearch()');" />
             &nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_dropdown" class="lgsearch_item">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10269327">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10269327">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10269327">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting Started with Reference Resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10139332">
          <p>
           The resources on this page can help you to
           <strong>
            brainstorm
           </strong>
           topic ideas,
           <strong>
            narrow
           </strong>
           your topic to make it more manageable, or learn
           <strong>
            background
           </strong>
           information about a topic you have picked.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10139332" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10271595">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10271595">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10271595">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Encyclopedias, Handbooks, Literature Reviews, and More
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10271595">
          <p>
           To find more print and online reference books for general anthropology, as well as specific subjects within or related to anthropology, search Encompass Search or ask for help.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10271595" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12488794">
              <a id="link_12488794" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12488794,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas, including many notable titles for anthropology. Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12488796">
              <a id="link_12488796" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/gvrl/infomark.do?type=aboutBook&amp;prodId=GVRL&amp;eisbn=9781412979283&amp;userGroupName=mul_coll&amp;version=1.0" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12488796,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12488796}); ">
               21st Century Anthropology: A Reference Handbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Highlights the most important anthropology topics, issues, questions, and debates in the 21st century. Includes applied anthropology, archaeology and paleontology, sociocultural anthropology, evolution, linguistics, physical and biological anthropology, and primate studies.  Full text online.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12517539">
              <a id="link_12517539" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/137342787?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12517539,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12517539}); ">
               Annual Review of Anthropology
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Literature reviews providing summary and analysis of research in the field of anthropology, published annually. Good for an overview of the state of research on a given topic. Full text is available online for 1972-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12488795">
              <a id="link_12488795" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0SDW" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12488795,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12488795}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Anthropology
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Over 1,000 entries that focus on topics in physical/ biological anthropology, archaeology, cultural/social anthropology, linguistics, and applied anthropology. Also included are relevant articles on geology, paleontology, biology, evolution, sociology, psychology, philosophy, and theology.  Full text online.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12488797">
              <a id="link_12488797" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.oxford-evolution.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12488797,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12488797}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Evolution
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Entries by leading experts survey essential concepts and theories, present methods, models and findings, and discuss both the history of the field and current controversies.  Full text online.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10295625">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10295625">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10295625">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Resources for Newspapers and Magazines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10295625">
          <div id="boxatt10295625" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12517632">
              <a id="link_12517632" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12517632,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including psychology. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Get It links to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12517633">
              <a id="link_12517633" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12517633,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12517633}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10295627">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10295627">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10295627">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Websites
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10295627">
          <div id="boxatt10295627" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12517647">
              <a id="link_12517647" href="http://www.aaanet.org/resources/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12517647,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12517647}); ">
               Anthropology Resources on the Internet (American Anthropological Association)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Suggested resources from a key association in the field of anthropology.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

    <div id="customFooter">
    </div>
    <div id="trackingcode">
    </div>

       <tr>
